title: Kappa no Sanpei
synopsis: Sanpei is a lazy little 7 year old boy who rarely concentrates on anything beside eating his school dinners. Despite being constantly jeered at by his classmates for looking like a Kappa, Sanpei is a relatively happy go lucky boy that is quite content with living alone with his grandfather in the mountains.
staff: [['Hirata, Toshio', ['Director']], ['Mizuki, Shigeru', ['Original Creator']], ['Yukimuro, Shunichi', ['Screenplay']], ['Tatsuike, Noboru', ['Background Art']]]
